abstract: Palestinian Liberation Organization calls for a curtailing of longstanding security coordination with Israel; move, which will require authorization by Palestinian Authority Pres Mahmoud Abbas, comes as yet another escalation in cycle of retaliation between Israel and Palestinians.
lead_paragraph: A leadership body called for curtailing the longstanding cooperation with Israel, but left final decisions to President Mahmoud Abbas and the Palestine Liberation Organization’s executive committee.

headline.main: Palestinian Council Questions Security Arrangement With Israel
headline.print_headline: P.L.O. Council Questions Security Cooperation With Israel

snippet: A leadership body called for curtailing the longstanding cooperation with Israel, but left final decisions to President Mahmoud Abbas and the Palestine Liberation Organization’s executive committee.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
